pages.text: Enchants and Augments both do similar things, but they Effect different things.

pages.title: Enchants
pages.text: These ONLY effect Upgrades, while you could enchant a pedestal, it does not benefit the pedestal in any way, and you will loose the enchants on the pedestal once its placed down.

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: These ONLY effect the Pedestal, Upgrades inserted in the pedestal will NOT be any more effective if the pedestal has Augments in it.

pages.title: Why U Do Dis?
pages.text: Upgrades are very much a single setup, where pedestals tend to be augmented more and more as your progress in your playthrough. Having to break a pedestal, would be annoying everytime you wanted to make it 'better' so it uses a more dynamic 'upgrading' system.
